```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: web-app
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: docker.io/centos/httpd  ![1](assets/1.png)
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/www/html     ![3](assets/3.png)
      name: git
  - name: poll
    image: axeclbr/git             ![2](assets/2.png)
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/data     ![3](assets/3.png)
      name: git
    env:
    - name: GIT_REPO
      value: https://github.com/mdn/beginner-html-site-scripted
    command:
    - "sh"
    - "-c"
    - "git clone $(GIT_REPO) . && watch -n 600 git pull"
    workingDir: /var/lib/data
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: git
```
